short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use Wise Search extension to search the web!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome Wise Search by Aztec lets you quickly search the web from your browser's address bar!
Wise Search extension will set your default-search to blpsearch.com.

Please read carefully: By clicking the “Free+ Add to Chrome” button in the top right hand corner above and installing this extension, you agree to install this application, and you agree to the End User License Agreement and the Privacy Policy.  You can uninstall the program at any time. 

End User License Agreement:   http://www.blpsearch.com/terms

Privacy Policy: http://www.blpsearch.com/privacy
